Please, please, it‚Äôs so darn awful, give us a chance to turn it off, it completely ruins the game, and i am not exaggerating at all, ugh. If i‚Äôd known about the music i would not have bought it...

A truly amazing game! The graphics are amazing. I love how you can make your own decisions and the music. A perfect combination of mystery, supernatural, and comedy. I have played this game so many times seeing what other endings I could uncover. There are many scares and sentimental moments! In general I love this game but I want more. I would love if there is a before, more in depth storyline for the game. Basically I was hoping for a ‚Äúbefore they got to the island‚Äù app. Expecting more on how Alex‚Äôs brother died, their parents,How  Alex got her hair dyed.

Thanks again for this amazing game and thanks for reading.

Love the game in pc and iPad but for whatever reason I can‚Äôt get full screen on my iPhone 12 Pro Max. It‚Äôs probably something to do with an update. However, seeing as though this developer has put this game on iOS the wayside, I‚Äôm probably out of luck.

title.label: The only thing I don‚Äôt like about this game.

content.label: It‚Äôs full version is of it is free with game pass to play on Xbox One. Then you can play though the open story part here but half to pay in order to play the full game then to play the game on android or iOS device with google play store at all, you have to buy it 1st before you can download it when on iapp store on any apple mobile device you can download it for free then play a bit until it says you have to buy the full version to play the whole game. I will give 5 stars anyway just because I‚Äôm nice. Not because I wish to.

title.label: Can‚Äôt put into words how much I loved this game.

content.label:
First off loved that there is a free trial. I love that I had an opportunity to be able to try the game before purchasing it. I hate buying a game and realizing after the purchase, it was not for me. 

Second the story line was so interesting I couldn‚Äôt put the game down. I was so worried I would make a wrong choice and lose one of the characters. Yes even Clarissa. Smh. Even to the end made me want to play another time to see where the story would take me. I can‚Äôt leave out how great and relatable the personalities of each character, the interactions btwn them and how the dialogue was what I would might actually say as a response. You guys are imaginative, creative and fun. I would love to spend a day with you and pick the brain of the creator. 

Lastly I loved the art. It was beautiful. I can‚Äôt wait to see or play any game that is made by you guys. I rarely write any review whether it‚Äôs positive or negative. Just don‚Äôt have the time, but I had to write this one. I just couldn‚Äôt leave without giving you guys your earned positive review. You guys really got me through a tough week where I could leave my chaos and disappear into fun, thrilling and exciting place. Thank you!!!!!!
It‚Äôs good. At least the first part I got through. Paid for the full and it still tells me I need to pay for the full??
I never ever pay money for games what so ever, but I did this once. The animations are amazing, mixed with being able to move around characters, its amazing.

I never write reviews unless the game has amazed me and this game has. Recently I have been downloading a lot of Indie games and this one has been the best one yet. The graphics are on point and the art style is unique. The characters‚Äô backgrounds are very emotionally stimulating and the game invests you from the beginning. The storyline is so interesting with so many endings. If there was a Oxenfree 2 I would definitely play it.

title.label: Great but I need help with something please reply

content.label:
So the game is wonderful, but I can‚Äôt get past the level where your in the cave and are supposed to use the radio. What am I supposed to do at that part? I took the radio out and put it on the area where it wasn‚Äôt static, but it did nothing. I sat for a hour with it in that area, but nothing happened. I thought maybe I needed to buy the full story, so I did and it still didn‚Äôt work. Please help me.
 Besides for that problem, it‚Äôs pretty amazing so far. Please reply on what I‚Äôm supposed to do there though. Again this is a great game it just doesn‚Äôt work for me at one part.   I 100% recommend downloading this game, despite how much trouble I‚Äôm having.

title.label: Will change to 5 stars if you can shut off the music

content.label: Not having a music volume slider is insane. I find subtitles distracting and like to have them off, but the music is so loud (and irritating) that you can barely hear the dialogue. Finally had to stop playing after twenty minutes and doubt I‚Äôll go back into the game until this is fixed.

i love the game but i can never get through the first part because it keeps crashing on me time and time again. it‚Äôs just frustrating every time i relaunch the game, i basically have to play the opening over again only to get to the place it crashes without fail. wish i could get a refund.

title.label: It's got a great story, but...

content.label:
I bought this game when it first came out. I loved it, it was fun, something I could do in study hall, or when I was bored, but now I come back, two years later, and there's a full version I have to pay for? No, not going to happen. I would truly like to play the full version, but I don't need to be leeched out of paying an extra 4 or so bucks, that I already payed years back.

I‚Äôm back again, and I‚Äôve still got to pay money for a game I already bought three years ago. Still mad, I feel scammed of my money. Everyone might want to be careful. You may have bought it now, but just wait til they make an update you weren‚Äôt expecting and make you pay again.
amazing. wow. scared the crap outta me. DO NOT play if you are epileptic.
I purchased the app but I‚Äôm unable to continue on to epiphany fields, so I‚Äôm sort of just stuck?

Okay, the quality isn‚Äôt bad, the games overall good, but i got in for 5 mins and got kicked out. Tried again. Same thing. So, it was good for the 5 mins i got in. Fix pls. I cant get in. Also, the loading takes a lot of time.

Ok, I‚Äôve been playing this game for like 6 of the last 12 hours, so I feel reasonably qualified to say this game is killer. It‚Äôs got a good balance of eerie and sweet, enough that I‚Äôm looking over my shoulder when I hear weird noises, but I‚Äôll still be able to fall asleep. The gameplay is giving me some serious tv show vibes (Locke and Key, Haunting of Hill House, and even Stranger Things, all for reasons I won‚Äôt explain, bc spoilers). I‚Äôve played it about 1.5 times at this point, and I really like that it has enough structure so I don‚Äôt really get stuck, but my choices (apparently) can still lead to slightly different outcomes! Even though I‚Äôve ‚Äúfinished‚Äù the game, there‚Äôs still a lot more for me to discover, and (hopefully) a few more outcomes! Really makes it feel worth the $5, since I will definitely play it again. Also want to mention that I LOVE how there‚Äôs some... aftereffects playing it the second time. My only complaint would be that the movement can be a little buggy sometimes, like it won‚Äôt let me climb up a wall, and I just have to walk away and come back a couple times. Even with this minor issue, I 10/10 recommend this game to anyone who enjoys a bit of creepiness!

Okay, I NEVER write reviews for games. Like, ever. But this game is really amazing, and I was on the App Store anyway, so here you go!!!

This game is amazing, ABSOLUTELY worth the money. I‚Äôve played it over and over and over, and I am never disappointed with the amount of new choices; I love the plot, the characters, and the humor and horror that are beautifully blended together. I will say that moving the radio, switching channels, is a little tedious at times. I also wish this game had a save button, or saved at any point between entering the bomb shelter and the very end. But‚Äî and I cannot stress this enough‚Äî THE GAME IS WORTH IT. It‚Äôs been like three months since I got it, and I can‚Äôt stop replaying.

This game is amazing. It‚Äôs chilling, funny, heartwarming, and beautiful. I cannot write a good enough review, but I hope this will do. üôÇ

Downloaded game.  Three time clicked on the game. Three times it opened to a blank screen and then turned off.  I deleted it.

This game is...something else.

The characters are very likable (yes, even Clarissa at times), it has an amazing story. It‚Äôs a game I‚Äôd suggest to all horror fans and even non horror fans. There is something in the game for everyone and anyone.

Also, I suggest listening to Vaporwave music or the Stranger Things soundtrack while playing this. It makes it so much better. Then again, there is the already amazing soundtrack within the game itself :D

title.label: Seems cool but cant even get past the tutorial

content.label: I think it would be a very fun and cool and beautiful game. But I can‚Äôt get past the tutorial because it won‚Äôt let me tap on the radio or the pause because it‚Äôs off screen or something. I can see it but when I tap on it nothing happens. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs just my phone model (XR) or what but the game doesn‚Äôt even take up all of the screen, there‚Äôs like half an inch or so of black, open screen that could be used. It‚Äôs extremely difficult to admire the hard work that was put into the art and story that is clearly put into the game because you can hardly even see the game. I understand that you have to pay to get the full game which makes complete sense because you wouldn‚Äôt want ads popping up in the middle of the story and the devs need the money to make more games and what not. My only problem is that I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôm looking at or if it‚Äôs even worth paying for the full game if I can‚Äôt see anything. I would love to test out the game further than maybe 1 and a half minutes to see if it‚Äôs worth buying. I can tell that this game is amazing already from the little time I spent playing. I hope this can be fixed somehow and I hope that this helps!
